page-docs-nav-program-principles-descrip: Your guide to the first principles behind our programs.
page-docs-nav-what-are-first-principles-: A detailed exploration of the concept of first principles, and how they differ from conventional thinking.
page-docs-nav-how-do-I-submit-first-prin: How Do I Submit First Principles?
Our preferred page structure for submitting a new principle.
page-docs-nav-breathing-techniques-descr: How does breathing affect your focus and well-being?
page-docs-nav-flow-state-description: How does flow state actually work?
page-docs-nav-meditation-description: What does meditation do to your brain?
page-docs-nav-pain-description: How does pain faciliate growth and development?
page-docs-nav-pareto-principle-80-20-rul: What is the most effective way of prioritizing that will help you achieve the most productivity and results?
page-docs-nav-sensory-deprivation-descri: What does depriving yourself of your senses do?
page-docs-nav-empathy-description: Understand why we can't ever really feel what another person is feeling, and what true empathy is all about.
page-docs-nav-visible-progress-fuels-mot: Discover how visible progress boosts motivation and learn strategies to stay motivated when results take time.
page-docs-nav-big-results-take-time-desc: Learn how the planning fallacy causes us to overestimate short-term gains and underestimate long-term success.
page-docs-nav-better-done-than-perfect-d: The journey towards your goals is more important than achieving a perfect outcome.
page-docs-nav-immersion-drives-engagemen: Discover how fully immersing yourself in an experience boosts engagement and success.
page-docs-nav-visibility-drives-accounta: Learn how sharing your progress (aka working out loud) can create accountability and help you stay consistent in working toward your goals.
page-docs-nav-reward-should-match-effort: The more challenging or time-consuming the task, the greater the reward should be to sustain your motivation.
page-docs-nav-reward-what-matters-descri: Align your rewards with high-impact actions to ensure you're prioritizing the most meaningful actions for growth and success.
page-docs-nav-write-it-or-forget-it-desc: Capturing ideas and tasks ensures nothing slips through the cracks and keeps you organized.
page-docs-nav-quests-you-get-to-do-descr: Reframe your tasks as opportunities for growth and rewards, turning them into quests you get to do, not chores you have to do.
page-docs-nav-habit-stacking-description: Pairing a new habit with an existing one (habit stacking) makes it easier to build routines by anchoring new behavior to something already ingrained in your daily life.
page-docs-nav-delayed-gratification-desc: Rewards are more satisfying and meaningful when earned through effort. Learn how delaying rewards reinforces discipline and builds long-term success.
page-docs-nav-balance-reduces-burnout-de: Maintaining a balance between work and play reduces burnout and keeps you motivated for long-term success.
page-docs-nav-perspective-changes-reward: Discover how your changing perspectives influence what rewards will matter to you.
page-docs-nav-celebrate-your-wins-descri: Big or small, celebrating your wins along the way keeps you motivated to push forward toward even greater challenges.
page-docs-nav-clarity-builds-confidence-: Knowing where you're going boosts confidence, reduces uncertainty, and keeps you motivated throughout the journey.
page-docs-nav-practice-with-purpose-desc: Progress in any skill requires intentional and focused practice over time, not just repetition.
page-docs-nav-measure-twice-cut-once-des: Careful planning enables you to minimize mistakes and avoid unnecessary rework.
page-docs-nav-the-gacha-effect-descripti: Variable rewards create excitement and sustain motivation, turning even mundane tasks into engaging challenges.
page-docs-nav-self-preservation-descript: Learn how our bodies are hardwired to survive at all costs and how we can use it to our advantage.
page-docs-nav-fight-flight-freeze-descri: Understand the different ways we respond to danger, and the pros and cons of each.
page-docs-nav-short-term-gain-long-term-: Learn how to take short-term actions while being mindful of the long-term consequences they might carry.
page-docs-calltocontribute-desc-1: If you're an expert on the topic and want to contribute, edit this page and sprinkle it with your wisdom.
page-docs-calltocontribute-desc-2: You'll be credited and you'll be helping comrades who are interested in this topic!
page-docs-calltocontribute-desc-3: Edit this page below or if you want to make a submission,
page-docs-calltocontribute-desc-4: Have questions? Ask us in our
page-docs-calltocontribute-link: learn how to submit a new principle.
banner-page-incomplete: This page is incomplete and we'd love your help. Edit this page and add anything that you think might be useful to others.
